snippet.title: Memory Lost - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description: Check out brutal gameplay as enemies get destroyed in this trailer for Memory Lost, an upcoming cyberpunk-style third-person story-driven action shooter game. In Memory Lost, take a deep dive into the depths of Detraxis, a dystopian metropolis full of technological miracles and cruel corporate battles. Memory Lost will be available on Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, and PC in 2023.
